answers.text: Spanish nationals of West/Central African descent
Angola, Brazil, Cameroon, Cape Verde, Equatorial Guinea, Ghana, Gambia, Guinea-Bissau, Mali, Nigeria and Senegal

qas.question: Which Spanish colony do Afro-Spaniards reside?
How many Afro-Spaniards currently live in Spain?

context: Afro-Spaniards are <a0_0>Spanish nationals of West/Central African descent<a0_0/>. They today mainly come from <a1_0>Angola, Brazil, Cameroon, Cape Verde, Equatorial Guinea, Ghana, Gambia, Guinea-Bissau, Mali, Nigeria and Senegal<a1_0/>. Additionally, many Afro-Spaniards born in Spain are from the former Spanish colony <a2_0>Equatorial Guinea<a2_0/>. Today, there are <a3_0>an estimated 683,000<a3_0/> Afro-Spaniards in Spain.
